oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Jogo Blues
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Handy, W. C.; music; sheet music;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of the sheet music to W. C. Handy's "The Jogo Blues," played by Handy and his Bands as the Memphis Itch. Dedicated to Mr. John Ross of Memphis, Tenn. Published by Pace & Handy Music Co. in Memphis, Tenn. The cover depicts a young man dressed in blue playing the "Jogo Blues" on the piano.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Handy, W. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: W. C. Handy Beale Street Collection
